import { Avatar, Divider } from '@material-ui/core' import { NotificationImportant, Settings } from '@material-ui/icons' import React,{useState} from 'react' import { Icon, Input } from 'semantic-ui-react' import myimg from './../imgs/old.JPG' import './chatroom.css' import chatdata from './../../dami-data/chat' const Chatroom = () => { const [chatmessages, setchatmessages] = useState(chatdata) const [typemessage, settypemessage] = useState("Type message ") const newmessage =(e)=>{ settypemessage(e.targrt.value) } const addmessage=()=>{ setchatmessages( [ ...chatmessages, {message:"hello"} ] ) } return ( <>
